local_intent: Lift the grasped grapes upward by 0.1 along z to begin transfer while ensuring the grasp remains stable.
assumptions: Grapes are already grasped and stable prior to the lift.
coherence_with_global: Matches the global sequence segment: after verifying IsGraspStable, perform MoveDelta z=0.1 with short timeout, then confirm the object remains in the gripper before proceeding toward the plate.
